darkhistory.history.tla¶

Three-level atom model and integrator.

Functions

compton_cooling_rate(xHII, xHeII, xHeIII, …) Returns the Compton cooling rate.
get_history(rs_vec[, init_cond, f_H_ion, …]) Returns the ionization and thermal history of the IGM.
